name: lightflow
description: Tiny Promise-like control flow library for browser and Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build-node && npm run build-browser
scripts.build-browser: npm run build-browser-cl && npm run build-browser-fl
scripts.build-browser-cl: SET BABEL_ENV=browser&&babel -o dist/lightflow.js src/lightflow.js && uglifyjs -c -m --source-map dist/lightflow.min.js.map -o dist/lightflow.min.js dist/lightflow.js
scripts.build-browser-fl: SET BABEL_ENV=browser&&babel -o dist/flat/lightflow.js src/flat/lightflow.js && uglifyjs -c -m --source-map dist/flat/lightflow.min.js.map -o dist/flat/lightflow.min.js dist/flat/lightflow.js
scripts.build-node: npm run build-node-current && npm run build-node-lts && npm run build-node-old
scripts.build-node-current: SET BABEL_ENV=node&&babel -o lib/index.js src/lightflow.js&&babel -o lib/flat/index.js src/flat/lightflow.js
scripts.build-node-lts: SET BABEL_ENV=node_lts&&babel -o lib/lts/index.js src/lightflow.js&&babel -o lib/lts/flat/index.js src/flat/lightflow.js
scripts.build-node-old: SET BABEL_ENV=node_old&&babel -o lib/0.x/index.js src/lightflow.js&&babel -o lib/0.x/flat/index.js src/flat/lightflow.js

author: SAPer
